::Aerotaur::
    He caught the movement in his peripheral vision but it was too late.  The 
spines caught him in the back of the knees and he fell backwards.  As he fell 
over the tail that was still stuck in his legs he slashed at a part that 
would sever the spined end of the tail off of the beast.
